tooltip.block.partnership.boatyard: Arr! Required to craft, enhance, or mend boats.\nAlso grants ye the power to forge other treasures and tools vital for the open sea.
tooltip.block.partnership.buoy: For markin' the bounds or peculiarities on the mighty seas.
tooltip.block.partnership.chain_buoy: Deployed to mark the boundaries betwixt buoys at sea.
tooltip.block.partnership.anchor: Perfect for docks to batten down the hatches of me boats.
tooltip.item.partnership.captains_hat: Worn by the Cap'n himself, aye!
tooltip.block.partnership.marine_cannon: Ye can set it up and let loose from a chosen angle. Sends ships to Davy Jones' locker the moment it connects. Must be loaded with a Cannonball and up to three Gunpowder, then give it a go with a redstone signal
tooltip.item.partnership.kayak: A tad bigger than yer average vessel, but she's got space for a crew of three hearty shipmates!
tooltip.item.partnership.lifebuoy: Hurl this to the scallywag in dire need!
tooltip.item.partnership.sailboat: Faster than a normal boat because of its sail.
menu.partnership.marine_cannon.rotate: click 'n haul to swivel the cannon
command.partnership.feedback.error.playe: Only players can use this command.
command.partnership.feedback.dockableChu: Chunk %s is not being marked as dock.
Chunk %s has one anchor marking it as an dock.
Chunk %s has %s anchors marking it as an dock.
